content: single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 108 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 444sc row 41 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet*1sc in the next 110 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 110 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 452 single_crochet row 42 slip_stitch to next single_crochet ch1 3 single_crochet*1sc in the next 112 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet**repeat twice 1 single_crochet in the last 112 single_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 460sc fasten_off weave in ends thank you for purchasing the ealasaid baby blanket please do not sell or claim it to be your own pattern you may make and sell the finished item please do not use my pictures hope you enjoy making the ealasaid many thanks michelle x i named this blanket after my mother ealasaid means elizabeth in gaelic x
